titleStmt.title: [The four sons of Aymon]
Renaut de Montauban (Chanson de geste). English.
titleStmt.author: Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.

notesStmt.note: A translation by William Caxton of: Quatre fils Aimon.
Title page lacking in all known copies.
Place of publication and printer's name supplied and publication date estimated by STC; "A de Worde ed. of 8 May 1504 is mentioned in the colophon of 1010 sqq. and may be this one"--STC.
Identified as STC 1009 on UMI microfilm reel 17.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Cambridge University Library.
Appears at reel 17 (British Library copy) and at reel 21 (Cambridge University Library copy).
